title: Norwegian Air raises frequency of some transatlantic flights
text:
FILE PHOTO: Grounded Boeing 737 Max 8 passenger plane of the Norwegian low-cost airline Norwegian is seen parked on the tarmac at Helsinki Airport in Vantaa, Finland March 13, 2019. Lehtikuva/Heikki Saukkomaa via REUTERS/File Photo

OSLO (Reuters) - Norwegian Air (NWC.OL) will raise the number of flights it offers on several of its transatlantic routes due to good demand, the budget carrier said on Friday.

In total, 12 routes between Europe and the United States will see an increase in frequency.
description: Norwegian Air will raise the number of flights it offers on several of its transatlantic routes due to good demand, the budget carrier said on Friday.
